sentence: Cheney who has clashed with Trump over his debunked election claims and the January 6 insurrection at the US Capitol is set to face water rights attorney Harriet Hageman in a Republican primary in August.
author: John L. Dorman
title: Trump wants Wyoming lawmakers to change their election laws to block Liz Cheney from receiving crossover votes in the state's GOP primary
